name: Mouse VS Mouse
description:
There so much cheese on the kitchen!

When the cat's off, rats throw a party.

But... it's not time to give up.

Two players will fight to get the right of obtaining all the cheese!!!

THIS IS... MOUSE VS MOUSE!!!

Instructions:
- Player 1 uses arrows keys to control "the gray one"
- Player 2 uses the mouse to drag tables/chairs and activate "the cleaner"
